page.title: 14Shopping 1 Shobdon and Byton
page.content:
In this part of the survey we wanted to find out whether people in Shobdon and Byton used the local shops.
There are 2 shops in Shobdon and a sub-post office.In Byton there is a sub-post office which also sells milk,papers etc.
We found out that the majority of people{used the local shop. 49 people used the shops regularly 29 people used them occasionally.
Most people had milk and papers delivered to their homes.Though 12 didn't have milk delivered and 16 didn't have papers delivered.
A few people{(13) used a mobile shop.
